name: Quaker's Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Quater-Deck Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Quartier Latin Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Wilson's Dingo Bar, Rue Delambre, Paris.

name: Queen Mary Cocktail
note: This cocktail is in honour of the Queen Mary winning the Blue Riband in 1936.

name: Queen's Cocktail
instruction: Add ice, shake well, and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Quelle Vie Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Quill Cocktail
note: Recipe by Frank C. Payne, New York.
